subject: Automobile Racing
Finances
lead_paragraph: USF1, the first Formula One team based in the United States since the 1970s, is plagued by financial problems and may miss the opening race of the season in Bahrain.
snippet: USF1, the first Formula One team based in the United States since the 1970s, is plagued by financial problems and may miss the opening race of the season in Bahrain.
